message.body: hey/ call u at 5 on my way home from work.
i have the kids on fridays now. how is sunday after 5. saturday I will be in Ny. And for treatment, I will book you on Saturdays! We can tak about the a

I think Sunday after 5 might work but let me wait till I get home with my day planner. I can be a little droopy on Sunday evenings but still want to see you. Wild idea--my yoga studio has Zumba on Sundays at 5. Would you want to do a little booty dancing
Hey lady, I emailed you late last night about Sunday. Check your email when you get a chance!!! xoxoxo
sun is gr8. why we dont hang out at yoyr place or go for a walk?
That sounds so fun! What time is good for you?
hows 5:15. I can pick you up and we can walk the drive or park...decide later?
We will do things that cost money sometimes too but we are both in the same money saving boat. :)
